channel.title: Drift City
channel.description:
Pretty good game, the multiplayer's alright. but it could use some work. You do missions every time you level up. coupons for cars. and other pretty nice stuff.
[url=http://Drift.ijji.com]Drift.ijji.com[/url]
and if anyone can find a way to get free G Coins. i would <3 to get a link or something.
